collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (6 total Queries, 6 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: select DISTINCT title,c1t.code,c1titleID,c1.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c1 WHERE tbl_client_files_c1.c1tID = c1.c1tID and tbl_client_files_c1.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c1.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c1 WHERE tbl_client_files_c1.c1tID = c1.c1tID and tbl_client_files_c1.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c1.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c1_titles as c1t, tbl_client_files_c1 as c1 where c1t.c1titleID = c1.c1tID and c1.clientID = 3 and c1.workpaper = 5

select DISTINCT title,c2t.code,c2titleID,c2.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c2 WHERE tbl_client_files_c2.c2tID = c2.c2tID and tbl_client_files_c2.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c2.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c2 WHERE tbl_client_files_c2.c2tID = c2.c2tID and tbl_client_files_c2.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c2.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c2_titles as c2t, tbl_client_files_c2 as c2 where c2t.c2titleID = c2.c2tID and c2.clientID = 3 and c2.workpaper = 5

select DISTINCT title,c3t.code,c3titleID,c3.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c3 WHERE tbl_client_files_c3.c3tID = c3.c3tID and tbl_client_files_c3.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c3.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c3 WHERE tbl_client_files_c3.c3tID = c3.c3tID and tbl_client_files_c3.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c3.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c3_titles as c3t, tbl_client_files_c3 as c3 where c3t.c3titleID = c3.c3tID and c3.clientID = 3 and c3.workpaper = 5
select DISTINCT cfi.added_on,cfi.added_by,tu.name from tbl_users as tu, tbl_client_file_index as cfi where tu.userID = cfi.added_by and cfi.workpaper = 5 and cfi.client = 3

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select DISTINCT title,c1t.code,c1titleID,c1.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c1 WHERE tbl_client_files_c1.c1tID = c1.c1tID and tbl_client_files_c1.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c1.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c1 WHERE tbl_client_files_c1.c1tID = c1.c1tID and tbl_client_files_c1.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c1.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c1_titles as c1t, tbl_client_files_c1 as c1 where c1t.c1titleID = c1.c1tID and c1.clientID = 3 and c1.workpaper = 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select DISTINCT title,c2t.code,c2titleID,c2.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c2 WHERE tbl_client_files_c2.c2tID = c2.c2tID and tbl_client_files_c2.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c2.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c2 WHERE tbl_client_files_c2.c2tID = c2.c2tID and tbl_client_files_c2.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c2.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c2_titles as c2t, tbl_client_files_c2 as c2 where c2t.c2titleID = c2.c2tID and c2.clientID = 3 and c2.workpaper = 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select DISTINCT title,c3t.code,c3titleID,c3.remarks, (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c3 WHERE tbl_client_files_c3.c3tID = c3.c3tID and tbl_client_files_c3.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c3.clientID = 3) as x , (select COUNT(*) from tbl_client_files_c3 WHERE tbl_client_files_c3.c3tID = c3.c3tID and tbl_client_files_c3.workpaper = 5 and tbl_client_files_c3.clientID = 3 and `updated_on` IS NOT NULL) as y from tbl_c3_titles as c3t, tbl_client_files_c3 as c3 where c3t.c3titleID = c3.c3tID and c3.clientID = 3 and c3.workpaper = 5

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: select DISTINCT cfi.added_on,cfi.added_by,tu.name from tbl_users as tu, tbl_client_file_index as cfi where tu.userID = cfi.added_by and cfi.workpaper = 5 and cfi.client = 3
